Reviews.Title: What type of cameras
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This camera hunter which I own, picks up WIRELESS baby cams, wireless web cams ect...WHAT IT WON"T PICK UP is IP cameras like an Axis 207W for example which I also own. I have picked up a few cameras and mostly all of them were wireless baby cameras or unsecured security cameras, but it will not pick up the typical Wireless IP cameras like an axis that encrypts the frequency or channel. While its pretty cool when you pick up your first camera, you will be disappointed for the most part as most wireless cameras you were hoping to pick up are encrypted. The camera hunter does do what it says, but it just doesn't go into detail which type of cameras it will pick up and won't pick up which is huge when deciding if you're going to spend $500.

Reviews.Title: not sure if item works
Reviews.Author: irving bond
Reviews.Content: I live in a major city in the United States. I have walked with this unit for many miles and many hours. I HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY SIGNALS. Not sure if these units work.

Reviews.Title: How does it work and who do I contact for help?
Reviews.Author: henry mitchell jr
Reviews.Content: How do I check to see if it really works, $500.00 and I am not able to check to see if it works or not.
